task.title: Starting a chat
task.shortdesc: You can start a chat conversation from the chat main screen or directly with an individual or group in your contact list.

taskbody.context: You can send chat messages to both users who are online and offline. However, users who are offline do not receive the message until they are online.

step.cmd: From the Chat main screen, locate the person to send a message.

choices.choice: Locate the person in your active chat list.
Type in the person's name in the search field.

info.note: You can also initiate a chat from your contact list.

step.cmd: Type you message and then tap the send icon ().
